machine_learning_algorithms.name: Linear Regression
machine_learning_algorithms.description: A linear approach to modeling the relationship between a dependent variable and one or more independent variables.

machine_learning_algorithms.name: K-Nearest Neighbors
machine_learning_algorithms.description: A non-parametric method used for classification and regression by analyzing the k nearest neighbors of a point.

machine_learning_algorithms.name: Support Vector Machine
machine_learning_algorithms.description: A classification method that separates data into classes using a hyperplane that maximizes the margin between them.

machine_learning_algorithms.name: K-Means Clustering
machine_learning_algorithms.description: A clustering algorithm that partitions data into k distinct clusters based on the mean of the points in each cluster.

machine_learning_algorithms.name: Random Forest
machine_learning_algorithms.description: An ensemble learning method that constructs multiple decision trees and merges them to obtain more accurate and stable predictions.

machine_learning_algorithms.name: Principal Component Analysis
machine_learning_algorithms.description: A dimensionality reduction technique that transforms data into a set of orthogonal components, ranked by the amount of variance they explain.
